scripts.deploy: forge build && forge create --rpc-url localhost:8545 --private-key $(grep PRIVATE_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2) src/RRoyale.sol:RRoyale
scripts.deployproxy: forge build && forge script script/DeployUUPS.s.sol:DeployUUPS --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 --broadcast --private-key $(grep PRIVATE_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2)
scripts.proxydeployartela: forge build && forge script script/DeployUUPS.s.sol:DeployUUPS --rpc-url https://betanet-rpc1.artela.network --broadcast --private-key $(grep PRIVATE_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2)
